step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with your arms stretched overhead and fingers open. Keep this position for the next step.
You're making a fist and pushing down well. Try to squeeze your shoulder blades together a bit more as you inhale and tighten your muscles.
Excellent job stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. You're doing great with the relaxation phase.
You're consistently returning to the overhead stretch. Remember to keep your fingers open during this part of the movement.
You're completing the repetitions well. Focus on maintaining a strong fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together during the push-down phase.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to make a strong fist and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you push down. Keep up the good work on stretching your arms overhead and relaxing as you exhale.
